content:
FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml
DIR_STATE:[".github/workflows/ci.yml", ".github/workflows/verify-build-artifacts.yml"]
Summary: CI workflow now runs verify_build_artifacts.py after the build step to fail when auditable artifacts are missing or empty.
